compute.pci.dev_type.placeholder: Please enter the device type, such as GPU, NPU, USB, etc.
compute.pci.vendor_id.extra: Reference for obtaining the device VendorId parameter
compute.pci.vendor_id.reg_error_msg: Please enter 4 digits containing lowercase letters or numbers
compute.pci.device_id.extra: Reference for obtaining the DeviceId parameter
compute.pci.device_id.reg_error_msg: Please enter 4 digits containing lowercase letters or numbers
compute.pci.host.extra: After the host is selected, the corresponding host will automatically report the corresponding transparent transmission device. If no device is selected, the host service needs to be restarted to take effect!
